thread.section_title: Sanctuary Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location, location, nothing else
thread.title_full: Location, location, nothing else - Review of Sanctuary Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Billintec
title: Location, location, nothing else
text: Did not live up to expectations. Elevator sized room with no instructions for TV channels, no menus, no info at all. No USB ports to recharge, and staff couldn't or wouldn't provide an adapter. Never seen such disinterested front desk staff. Room was quiet, except for loud HVAC fan that cycled every 15 minutes all night. Food was good, though trendy roof bar/restaurant was too loud and cold to attempt dining.
